achievements.name: The Sculpture Within
achievements.description: Buy the Sculpting Tools so you can craft the town table

achievements.name: Down by the Desert
achievements.description: Reach the 2nd world, where there's lots of sand... I hate sand...

achievements.name: Snowy Wonderland
achievements.description: Reach world 3, the coolest world in the game!

achievements.name: Rookie Player
achievements.description: You've done better than people who ditch after a few hours!

achievements.name: Average Player
achievements.description: You're easily in the top 50% of players now!

achievements.name: Elite Player
achievements.description: You've done better than most of my IRL friends who totally exist and aren't made up!

achievements.name: Veteran Gamer
achievements.description: You're easily in the top 5% now, that's something to be proud of maybe kind of!

achievements.name: Legendary Gamer
achievements.description: Your level is so massive it needs three digits! Just 4 more and you'll have a phone number!

achievements.name: Small Savings
achievements.description: 10,000 copper coins worth, that's enough to buy 1400 nomwiches!

achievements.name: Retirement Fund
achievements.description: 1,000,000 copper coins worth, that's enough to buy almost 91,000 rolls of Cue Tape!

achievements.name: Large Fortune
achievements.description: 100,000,000 copper coins worth, that's enough to buy 3.8 million hot dogs!

achievements.name: Guild Member
achievements.description: Contribute 500 GP to your guild, proving you aren't that kid in the school project who lets others do everything!

achievements.name: Guild Higher-Up
achievements.description: Contribute 3000 GP to your guild, putting yourself above fellow members who only have the 500 GP achievement!

achievements.name: Guild Top Dawg
achievements.description: Contribute 20000 GP to your guild, which means your probably the best bow-wow in your guild!

achievements.name: Another Me!
achievements.description: Create your 2nd character, who will probably never be as good as your 1st character.

achievements.name: More and More Me!
achievements.description: Create your 4th character, who will never appreciate the struggle the earlier characters went through from having no family bonus stats.

achievements.name: A Family of Me!
achievements.description: Create your 8th character, who will never get the love and affection you gave your first few characters when making new characters was still special

achievements.name: Do What You're Told
achievements.description: Complete 25 Quests on a single character. They're called Quests but they're more like chores tbh

achievements.name: Bending over Backward to Help
achievements.description: Complete 75 Quests on a single character. Seriously these are just errands the NPC's didn't wanna do.

achievements.name: Simpin' for NPC's
achievements.description: Complete 150 Quests on a single character. The name speaks for itself.

achievements.name: Card Collector
achievements.description: Collect 10 unique cards. Who knows you may even get a Baba Yaga Rookie Card!

achievements.name: Card Enthusiast
achievements.description: Collect 30 unique cards. If u wanna trade I got some spare Amarok cards!

achievements.name: Card Dude
achievements.description: Collect 120 unique cards. This basically makes you like, THE guy who does the card stuff!

achievements.name: Anvil Expansion
achievements.description: Craft the Anvil II expander. More things to craft, yay!

achievements.name: Anvil Expansion Again
achievements.description: Craft the Anvil III expander. More things to craft, again, yay!

achievements.name: Boss Buster
achievements.description: Defeat the big poop and the giant house with legs!

achievements.name: Demon Demolisher
achievements.description: Defeat the big hourglass and the toilet paper guy!

achievements.name: Spike Minigame Master
achievements.description: If u love me let me go... erm, I mean get a score of 13 in the Spike Minigame

achievements.name: Tree Top Dropout
achievements.description: Reach the top of the Giant Tree, then jump off... wait no don't do that last part.

achievements.name: Minecart Master
achievements.description: Get a score of 103+ in the Mining Minigame, beating the Developer's score!

achievements.name: Choppin' to the Beat
achievements.description: Get a score of 141+ in the Choppin' Minigame, beating the Developer's score!

achievements.name: Fishing Finesse
achievements.description: Get a score of 67+ in the Fishing Minigame, beating the Developer's score!

achievements.name: Catching Coronation
achievements.description: Get a score of 128+ in the Catching minigame, beating the Developer's score!

achievements.name: Crystal Beatdown
achievements.description: Defeat your first Crystal Monster! These have a 1 in 2000 chance to spawn each time you defeat a normal monster.

achievements.name: Crystal S-S-S-Suuuper Slam
achievements.description: Defeat 100 Crystal Monsters! This could go a couple rounds...

achievements.name: Crystal Championship Bout
achievements.description: Defeat 2000 Crystal Monsters to become the Heavyweight Champion of IdleOn!

achievements.name: Bad Doggy!
achievements.description: Defeat Amarok on Chaotic Difficulty. He's all bark and... well, all bite too honestly.

achievements.name: Dumbo the Destroyer
achievements.description: Defeat Efaunt on Chaotic Difficulty. Watch out for his new kick attack, and for all his old attacks since they're still deadly!

achievements.name: Part 1: Learn to Forge
achievements.description: Complete Glumlee's part of the Main Questline

achievements.name: Part 2: Learn to Entertain
achievements.description: Complete the Picnic Stowaway's part of the Main Questline

achievements.name: Part 3: Learn to Translate
achievements.description: Complete Stiltzcho's part of the Main Questline

achievements.name: Classy!
achievements.description: Choose one of the 3 starting classes, since like there are only 3 starting classes and not 4.

achievements.name: Sleepy Gamer
achievements.description: Claim 100 hours of AFK Gains. That's like 4 days and a side of fries.

achievements.name: Slumbering Gamer
achievements.description: Claim 2000 hours of AFK Gains. That's like 3 months but not really cuz u have multiple characters.

achievements.name: Comatose Gamer
achievements.description: Claim 30,000 hours of AFK gains. That's like 2 years, but again it's really more like 2 months cuz you have so many peeps in ur squad.

achievements.name: Hibernating Gamer
achievements.description: Claim 111,000 hours of AFK gains. Jeez, ok that's like an entire year, even with all your character idling to the max lol

achievements.name: My First Trophy!
achievements.description: Equip any trophy. Well, almost any trophy, limited-time trophies don't count.

achievements.name: Mythical Gamer
achievements.description: Your level has reached a point where people debate whether or not it is possible!

achievements.name: Big Mobs, eek!
achievements.description: Defeat 5 Giant Monsters. You'll learn about these at the Prayer Rock in the Frostbite Tundra town.

achievements.name: Powdered Neutronium
achievements.description: Rank up the Explosive Combustion refinery chamber to rank 2.

achievements.name: There Can Be Only One
achievements.description: Beat wave 50 of Wakawaka War without using more than 1 of any specific tower type. So just 1 boulder, 1 freeze, etc...

achievements.name: Blurple Skull
achievements.description: Get a Dementia Skull or higher on every mob within World 3 in the Deathnote feature. I probably don't have to specify "or higher" here lol

achievements.name: Mutant Massacrer
achievements.description: Defeat both mutant Minibosses: The Dilapidated Slush of World 3, and the Mutated Mush of World 4.

achievements.name: Petless
achievements.description: Trash 1000 pets. How could you be so heartless, so cold...

achievements.name: Milky Wayfarer
achievements.description: Reach World 4, the purple world with all the space stuff and things!

achievements.name: Mushrooms Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat enough Green Mushrooms to unlock the portal to FROGS!

achievements.name: Frogs Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat enough Frogs to unlock the portal to BEANS!

achievements.name: Beans Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat enough Beans to unlock the portal to SLIMES!

achievements.name: Slimes Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat enough Slimes to unlock the portal to BABY BOAS!

achievements.name: Baby Boas Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat enough Baby Boas to unlock the portal to CARROTMEN!

achievements.name: Carrotmen Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat enough Carrotmen to unlock the portal to GLUBLINS!

achievements.name: Glublins Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat enough Glublins to unlock the portal to THE BOSS!

achievements.name: Hitting the Mark
achievements.description: Chop 15 yellow sections in a row during the Choppin' Minigame.

achievements.name: 5 'hunned Copper
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 500 Copper Ore in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: 1.5 Ki'log'grams
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 1500 Oak Logs in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Copper 'Quipment
achievements.description: Equip the Copper Helmet and Copper Platebody

achievements.name: Wode Together
achievements.description: Defeat 250 Wode Boards with at least 1 other party member

achievements.name: 2 Tons of Iron
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 2,000 Iron Ore in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Giga Decimation
achievements.description: Defeat all Giga Frogs before any respawn.

achievements.name: Shut it Poochy
achievements.description: Defeat Amarok, the stone golem wolf of the Encroaching Forest.

achievements.name: Slimeicidal Endeavor
achievements.description: Defeat 25,000 slimes in total. This counts kills from all your characters!

achievements.name: Right to Bear Iron
achievements.description: Equip an Iron Helmet, Iron Chestplate, Iron Pants, and one Iron Tool.

achievements.name: 5-6 Pick up Sticks
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 20,000 Sticks in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: 20 Bundles of Jungle
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 20,000 Forest Fibers in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Colosseum Contender
achievements.description: Get a score of 25,000 or more in the Dewdrop Colosseum.

achievements.name: Ten Trips of Gold
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 30,000 Gold Ore in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Minecart Maniac
achievements.description: Slam on a yellow ore vein in the Mining Minigame, which gives 3 points!

achievements.name: Steppin' on the Rats
achievements.description: Defeat 500 Rats with at least 1 other party member

achievements.name: Tree Top Dropout
achievements.description: Reach the top of the Giant Tree in Blunder Hills

achievements.name: Naked and Unafraid
achievements.description: Enter the Sewers with no equipment or weapon, and defeat a sewer poop. Don't want to get your stuff dirty after all!

achievements.name: House Flipper
achievements.description: Defeat Baba Yaga in under 25 seconds after they spawn in the Birch Enclave

achievements.name: Platinum 200G
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 200,000 Platinum Ore in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Nutty Crafter
achievements.description: Craft 42 golden peanuts, whatever those might be!

achievements.name: Decked Out in Gold
achievements.description: Equip Golden Helmet, Chestplate, Pants, Shoes, two Golden tools, and the Defenders Dignity ring.

achievements.name: Nice Fur Suit
achievements.description: Equip all 4 pieces of Amarok armor.

achievements.name: Half a Mill-log
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 500,000 Veiny Logs in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Two-Time Savior
achievements.description: Equip the Blunder Hero Trophy, while also having another in your inventory.

achievements.name: Million Null 'n Void
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 1,000,000 Void Ore in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Seriousleaf-ast!
achievements.description: Score a point in the Choppin' Minigame while the leaf is ZOOMING!!!

achievements.name: Heyo!
achievements.description: Say 'Hi' to 250 different people without closing the game.

achievements.name: Based Roots
achievements.description: Reach The Roots, which is the map below the Sticks monsters in the Giant Tree

achievements.name: Dungeon Pinch
achievements.description: Deal 100 or more damage in a single hit in any party dungeon.

achievements.name: Big Frog Angry
achievements.description: Defeat Grandfrogger on his 1st Difficulty.

achievements.name: Big Frog Furious
achievements.description: Defeat Grandfrogger on his 2nd Difficulty.

achievements.name: Big Frog Big Sad
achievements.description: Defeat Grandfrogger on his 3rd Difficulty.

achievements.name: 2 Minute Meal
achievements.description: Spawn Grandfrogger within 2 minutes of entering the dungeon.

achievements.name: Big Frog Big Mad
achievements.description: Defeat Grandfrogger on his 4th Difficulty, and avoid becoming one with the soup...

achievements.name: Golden Fly
achievements.description: Pass through the small golden hoop in the Catching Minigame. It's worth 3 points!

achievements.name: Hammer Bub
achievements.description: Level up the 'Hammer Hammer' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 10

achievements.name: Wassup Yo!
achievements.description: Say 'Hi' to 100 unique people without closing the game or changing Servers.

achievements.name: Gold School
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 1500 Goldfish in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Buzz Buzz
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 2500 Flies in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Careful, it's Sharp!
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 15 Glass Shards in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Hybernation
achievements.description: Leave one of your players AFK for an entire week, which is 168 hours! Anything more counts too!

achievements.name: Vial Noob
achievements.description: Get 3 vials to Lv. 4, which are the green ones

achievements.name: Specializational!
achievements.description: Choose a subclass for two of your characters.

achievements.name: Obols Oh Boy!
achievements.description: Have 10 Silver Obols equipped at once. The Family tab counts here!

achievements.name: B-o-B to Help
achievements.description: Complete 75 unique quests on a single character. I'm not sure what B-o-B stands for either...

achievements.name: A Fish Too Far
achievements.description: Catch a total of 1000 fish across all Fishing Minigame plays.

achievements.name: Rat-a-tat-tat
achievements.description: Level up the 'FMJ' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 30

achievements.name: Pillars of Sand
achievements.description: Defeat 250,000 Sandy Pots combined across all characters. Forget the Pillars of Salt though.

achievements.name: Vial Connoisseur
achievements.description: Get 6 vials to Lv. 7, which are the pink ones

achievements.name: Coarse Cards
achievements.description: Level up cards for Mafioso, Sandcastle, Pincermin, and Mashed Potato, all up to 1 star.

achievements.name: Trial by Time
achievements.description: Run from Town to Efaunt's Tomb in under 2 minutes. No teleporting using the World Map.

achievements.name: Golden Obolden!
achievements.description: Have 15 Golden Obols equipped at once. The Family tab counts here!

achievements.name: Monocle No More
achievements.description: Defeat 160 Sand Giants within 10 minutes of entering the map. Auto must be off.

achievements.name: Jellyfish Jelly
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 6000 Jellyfish in your Storage Chest. I heard their Jelly goes good with burgers btw.

achievements.name: Super Cereal
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 50,000 Sentient Cereal in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Sweet Victory
achievements.description: Get a Score of 200,000 or more in the Sandstone Colosseum

achievements.name: Ink Blot
achievements.description: Use 101 silver pens in the Post Office

achievements.name: Threadin' the Needle
achievements.description: Pass through the teenie tiny Lava hoop in the Catching Minigame. It only appears if you go through 25 hoops in a row!

achievements.name: S-M-R-T
achievements.description: Level up the 'Smarty Boi' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 50

achievements.name: Two Desserts!
achievements.description: Have the YumYum Sheriff trophy equipped, while also having another in your inventory.

achievements.name: Nuget Nightmare
achievements.description: Kill Crabbycakes manually, without Auto on, until one drops a Nuget Cake. Good luck...

achievements.name: Bigtime Bloacher
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 100,000 Bloaches in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Vial Junkee
achievements.description: Get 10 vials to Lv. 9, which are the hyperlight Orange ones. Stop focusing so much on vials, it's not healthy!

achievements.name: Fruit Salad
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 1,000,000 Fruit Flies in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Your Skin, My Skin
achievements.description: Wear the Efaunt helmet, Ribcage, Hipillium, and Ankles. Also have 1 Efaunt Obol equipped.

achievements.name: Tomb Raider
achievements.description: Defeat Snakenhotep on his 1st Difficulty.

achievements.name: Tomb Defiler
achievements.description: Defeat Snakenhotep on his 2nd Difficulty.

achievements.name: Tomb Completionist
achievements.description: Defeat Snakenhotep on his 3rd Difficulty.

achievements.name: Wazzzzam!
achievements.description: Wazam 125 rooms in Snakenhotep's Dungeon by performing exceptionally well in a room.

achievements.name: Just Passing By
achievements.description: Pass 30 rooms in Snakenhotep's Dungeon by doing the thingy the room says to do.

achievements.name: Dungeon Slap
achievements.description: Deal 1000 or more damage in a single hit within any Dungeon.

achievements.name: Croakin' Froge
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 250 Doge -I mean froge- critters in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Sad Souls
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 1,000 Forest Souls in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Checkout Takeout
achievements.description: Checkout a total of 1000 talent books from the Talent Book Library.

achievements.name: Yawning Cogs
achievements.description: Have 4 unclaimed Yellow Cogs during any single moment in time, apart from March 16, 2026 at 3.07pm

achievements.name: Blunder Skull
achievements.description: Get a Copper Skull or higher on every Blunder Hills monster in the Deathnote.

achievements.name: Too Cute To Live
achievements.description: You're gonna kill all them lil' poofs? You monster... well, at least make it quick, like 20s or less after entering the map.

achievements.name: Soulslike
achievements.description: Have 4 Prayers in your Prayer Rock thingy. You get Prayers by placing these wizard dudes into towers and stuff and kickin' butt!

achievements.name: Good Times Roll
achievements.description: Beat wave 50 in Glublin Gorefest using ONLY Boulder Roller wizards. No freeze, no confetti, just boulder.

achievements.name: Cog in the System
achievements.description: Have 20 Grey Cogs placed on the board at once. Not sure why this is an achievement, cogs are boring.

achievements.name: I Create...
achievements.description: Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 50 times. Any buildings, utilities, wizards, shrines, they all count!

achievements.name: I Sawed...
achievements.description: Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 250 times.

achievements.name: Hairy Ice Comb
achievements.description: Manually loot 1000 floof poofs, then 1000 melty cubes, then 1000 moustache combs. So 3000 in total!

achievements.name: Giant Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat 5 Giant Mobs of each type; Bloque, Mamooth, Snowman, Penguin, then Thermister, IN THAT ORDER. So 25 in total!

achievements.name: Saharan Skull
achievements.description: Get a Golden Skull or higher on every YumYum Desert monster in the Deathnote.

achievements.name: Fat Souls
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 10,000 Dune Souls in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Borrowed Pens
achievements.description: Remember all those pens you lent out in school and never got back? You've got 13 seconds to vent your anger on every penguin mob!

achievements.name: Sqeakin' Mousey
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 60,000 Mouseys in your Storage Chest. Imagine the noise in that chest of yours... or even the smell, ugh.

achievements.name: Geared for Success
achievements.description: Have 40 Yellow Cogs placed on the board at once. Alright now I see how this is achievement worthy, cogs are kinda neat.

achievements.name: Entangled Compounds
achievements.description: Rank up the Spontaneous Combustion refinery chamber to Rank 3.

achievements.name: Souped Up Salts
achievements.description: Rank up the Redox Combustion refinery chamber to Rank 10.

achievements.name: I Constructed!
achievements.description: Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 900 times.

achievements.name: Cogs Be Waitin'
achievements.description: Have 16 unclaimed Grey Cogs at once. Jeez, I'm glad anthropomorphic cogs aren't real.

achievements.name: Top Cogs
achievements.description: 78 Cogs. All purple cogs. Did I say cogs are great? I think cogs are great. Cog cog cog!

achievements.name: Smirky Souls
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 250,000 Rooted Souls in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Knock on Wood
achievements.description: Beat wave 50 of Acorn Assault with just 4 towers active. Place down a 5th tower at any time, and it wont count!

achievements.name: The Goose is Loose
achievements.description: Have a HONK of exactly 1,000,000 Honkers in your HONK Chest. HONKHONKHONK HOOOONK!!!

achievements.name: Sepia Vision
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 500 Black Lenses in your Storage Chest. Better complete this before I make it 1,000!

achievements.name: Rattle them Bones
achievements.description: Defeat every Bloodbone in just 12 seconds after entering the map. Wow, wild.

achievements.name: Cool Score!
achievements.description: Get a Score of 2,500,000 or more in the Chillsnap Colosseum

achievements.name: Dungeon Wallop
achievements.description: Deal 25000 or more damage in a single hit within any Dungeon.

achievements.name: Boss Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat Glaciaxus on its 1st difficulty

achievements.name: Manager Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat Glaciaxus on its 2nd difficulty

achievements.name: Kingpin Defeated
achievements.description: Defeat Glaciaxus on its 3rd difficulty

achievements.name: Capitalist Win
achievements.description: Complete 1000 jobs within the Glacial Basement dungeon.

achievements.name: Equinox Visitor
achievements.description: Find the Equinox Mirror drop from Bloodbones, a 1 in 1000 drop, and use it to visit the Equinox Valley.

achievements.name: Channel Surfing
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 75,000 TV remotes in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Bottle Capital
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 800,000 Bottle Caps in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Too Many Tentacles
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 10,000,000 Wriggly Balls in your Storage Chest. Green Stack bro!

achievements.name: Matrix Wickermen
achievements.description: Accumulate 8760 hours, or an entire year, of Lab AFK time across all players.

achievements.name: I Like This Pet
achievements.description: Get a Breedability III heart on at least 2 Pets within the nest.

achievements.name: I LOVE These Pets
achievements.description: Get a Breedability VII heart on at least 15 pets within the nest.

achievements.name: Shiny Shells
achievements.description: Have 6 bronze (or rarer) eggs in your nest at the same time, waiting to be hatched!

achievements.name: Gilded Shells
achievements.description: Have 12 gold (or rarer) eggs in your nest at the same time, waiting to be hatched!

achievements.name: Barley Lost
achievements.description: Fail a pet battle with the enemy team having only 5% HP or less. Wait, barely it's spelled HOW???

achievements.name: Cabbage Patch
achievements.description: Have 5 kitchens all cooking cabbages at the same time. Remember gamers, eat your vegetables, they ain't so bad!

achievements.name: Le Pretzel Bleu
achievements.description: Have 8 kitchens all cooking Pretzels at the same time. Don't get it twisted, them pretzels are the real deal.

achievements.name: Michelin Ranked
achievements.description: Upgrade any kitchen stat to Lv. 300, giving you an elite crown over the upgrade bars, thus resulting in dopamine.

achievements.name: WOAH That's Fast
achievements.description: Have a speed of 'Too Fast' displayed while cooking an Eggplant. No this is not a metaphor.

achievements.name: Stars Among Stars
achievements.description: Complete all constellations in the Hyperion Nebula. Thats what world 4 is called btw.

achievements.name: Chippin' Away
achievements.description: Claim 25 chips from the Chip Repository. I was gonna make this 250 chips, but people from the future told me not to.

achievements.name: Hunned Times a Day
achievements.description: Claim spices by any means 10,000 times. Like, individual claims.

achievements.name: Good Plate
achievements.description: Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a diamond plate!

achievements.name: Great Plate
achievements.description: Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a purple plate!

achievements.name: Best Plate
achievements.description: Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a void pearl plate!

achievements.name: Space Party!!!
achievements.description: Dance with at least 5 other people while you're all in World 4 town!

achievements.name: Zero G Scoring
achievements.description: Get a Score of 10,000,000 or more in the Astro Colosseum

achievements.name: Soda Poisoning
achievements.description: Beat wave 50 of Clash of Cans with 3 Poisonic Elders at Lv 5 or higher. Also, you can't sell towers.

achievements.name: The True King
achievements.description: Reach a total of 1 million Orb Kills.

achievements.name: The True Pirate
achievements.description: Reach a total of 1 million Plunderous Kills. This one is the true challenge of the three.

achievements.name: The True Emperor
achievements.description: Reach a total of 1 million Wormhole Kills.

achievements.name: Veritable Master
achievements.description: Destruction comes to all who cross your path, no matter how many times you cross paths.

achievements.name: Maple Logger
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 200,000 Maple Logs in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Vitamin D-licious
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 5,000,000 Orange Slices in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Wurm Wumbo
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 100,000,000 Mongo Worm Slices in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Supernatural Gamer
achievements.description: Reach level 300 on any character! My oh my! This would have been inconceivable just a few years ago!

achievements.name: Smokin' Stars
achievements.description: Complete all constellations in the Smolderin' Plateau. You can check your progress within the Telescope.

achievements.name: The Plateauourist
achievements.description: Reach World 5, a personal favorite world of mine! Look, I like lava what can I say.

achievements.name: No Krakens? ):
achievements.description: Reach Wave 50 of Citric Conflict tower defence without placing a single Kraken Towers. Not even one.

achievements.name: Artifact Finder
achievements.description: Collect 15 Artifacts from Sailing

achievements.name: Artifact Enjoyer
achievements.description: Collect all 30 Artifacts from Sailing

achievements.name: Artifact Jones
achievements.description: Collect all 30 ANCIENT Artifacts from Sailing. All that glitters is not gold, but it sure is shiny!

achievements.name: Gilded Vessel
achievements.description: Upgrade a boat to Lv 100 in Sailing. It'll turn gold to reflect its power!

achievements.name: Maroon Warship
achievements.description: Upgrade a boat to Lv 300 in Sailing. This is the pinnacle of naval prowess, it doesn't get fancier than this!

achievements.name: Glory To Nobisect
achievements.description: Unlock the 3rd Divinity God.

achievements.name: All Hail Purrmep
achievements.description: Unlock the 7th Divinity God.

achievements.name: Long Live Bagur
achievements.description: Unlock the 10th and final Divinity God.

achievements.name: POiNG Champion
achievements.description: Get a POiNG score of 25,000 or more! My personal highscore is 38,323 at the time of coding this!

achievements.name: Lucky Harvest
achievements.description: Harvest a plant with a Bit worth who's first 3 digits are 777. For example, 77.7K Bits would count, or 777M Bits too!

achievements.name: Chemical Collector
achievements.description: Harvest a total of 1000 Chemical-type Plants in Gaming.

achievements.name: Voraci Vantasia
achievements.description: Harvest a total of 500 Voraci-type Plants in Gaming.

achievements.name: Bonsai Bonanza
achievements.description: Harvest a total of 100 Bonsai-type Plants in Gaming.

achievements.name: Perfect Trade Deal
achievements.description: Make a trade with Blobby G worth a gold bar amount that starts with 777, like 777K or 7.77M for example. PS; 776 and 778 work too lol

achievements.name: True Naval Captain
achievements.description: Buy all 20 Boats in Sailing. Uh, yea, there is a scroll bar below the boats, you can buy more than 5 boats

achievements.name: Legendary Orb
achievements.description: On your Divine Knight, get an Orb Score of 400 or more on OJ Bay. This is the number above your Orb!

achievements.name: Legendary Flag
achievements.description: On your Siege Breaker, get a Flag Score of 150 or more on Erruption River. This is the number above your Flag!

achievements.name: Legendary Wormhole
achievements.description: On your Elemental Sorcerer, get a Wormhole Score of 83 or more on Niagrilled Falls. This is the number above your Wormhole!

achievements.name: Lavathian Skulls
achievements.description: Get a Lava Skull or higher on every Smolderin' Plateau monster in the Deathnote. Yea, the 100M Kill Skull. This is gonna take a while.

achievements.name: Seaworthy Captain
achievements.description: Level up a Sailing Captain to Lv 15. Few captains in the universe can rival their ability to plunder!

achievements.name: Grand Captain
achievements.description: Level up a Sailing Captain to Lv 10. They shall sail the seas with confidence!

achievements.name: Valley Visitor
achievements.description: Reach World 6, the Spirited Valley! You'll love it here, all the spirits are very friendly!

achievements.name: Scorin' the Ladies
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 250,000 Ladybugs in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Effervess Enthusiess
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 5,000,000 Effervescent Logs in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: That's MY Crown
achievements.description: Have a stack of exactly 100,000,000 Royal Headpiece in your Storage Chest.

achievements.name: Lil' Overgrowth
achievements.description: Get an overgrowth of 32x on a single crop.

achievements.name: Major Overgrowth
achievements.description: Get an overgrowth of 1,024x on a single crop.

achievements.name: Unreal Overgrowth
achievements.description: Get an overgrowth of 8,192x on a single crop.

achievements.name: Doctor Repellant
achievements.description: Have 10,000 or more Apple crops in your Depot at once. You can lock the first crop before it grows to guarantee an apple!

achievements.name: Cob Enjoyer
achievements.description: Have 1,000,000 or more Corn crops in your Depot at once. Mmmm, Corn!

achievements.name: Science Undergrad
achievements.description: Find 30 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!

achievements.name: Science Graduate
achievements.description: Find 70 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!

achievements.name: Science Post Doc
achievements.description: Find 110 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!

achievements.name: Legumulucky
achievements.description: Make a crop trade with the Legumulyte worth exactly 777 magic beans.

achievements.name: Big Time Land Owner
achievements.description: Get 27 plots of land in your farm.

achievements.name: Ceramic Sneaking
achievements.description: Reach the Sneaking Floor with the Petrified Ceramist guest.

achievements.name: Top Floor Sneaking
achievements.description: Reach what seems like the top Floor of Sneaking with the Eldar Kingulyte guest.

achievements.name: Untying Extraordinaire
achievements.description: Untie 6 other Ninja Twins.

achievements.name: Lucky Stealy
achievements.description: Successfully find 6 items in a row, in a single AFK claim within Sneaking.

achievements.name: Yellow Belt
achievements.description: Find a +50 Yellow Belt Sneaking Charm. Yes, exactly +50.

achievements.name: Best Bloomie
achievements.description: Get a Bloomy Summoning Familiar.

achievements.name: Regalis My Beloved
achievements.description: Get a Regalis Summoning Familiar.

achievements.name: This, is, Summoning!
achievements.description: Survive for 5 minutes in The King's Gambit. Find this feature in Cavern 14 of the Hole in world 5.

achievements.name: Summoning CM
achievements.description: Get 10 Career Wins within Summoning

achievements.name: Summoning IM
achievements.description: Get 25 Career Wins within Summoning

achievements.name: Summoning GM
achievements.description: Get 58 Career Wins within Summoning

achievements.name: Penta Defence
achievements.description: Reach Wave 50 in Breezy Battle without placing more than 5 Towers in total.

achievements.name: Spectre Stars
achievements.description: Complete all constellations in the Spirited Valley. You can check your progress within the Telescope.

achievements.name: Beanstacker Trainee
achievements.description: Add 5 different golden foods to The Beanstalk.

achievements.name: Beanstacker Prodigy
achievements.description: Add 14 different golden foods to The Beanstalk.

achievements.name: W6 is Donezo
achievements.description: Get a Lava Skull or higher on every Spirited Valley monster in the Deathnote.
